title: Vase, 1955
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Georgiana L. McClellan
description: Tall, ovoid body, wide flaring neck with spines, knots and jagged edge.  Vanadium yellow glaze, with the clay shining through as brown mottle on body and neck.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, 1955.
1955. stoneware, glaze. Museum purchase through gift of Georgiana L. McClellan. 1955-64-1.
